intro.title: Hello!
intro.text:
My name is Simone Timi, I'm a full stack web developer and former speech pathologist with a passion for tech and linguistics.
 Let's swap out the articulation cards for some fresh lines of code!

about.title: About me
about.text:
I'm a former speech-language pathologist diving headfirst into the world of web development! Why?
 I've always had a knack for solving puzzles and finding creative solutions. That's what initially drew me to web development, and it didn't disappoint me. There's a unique thrill in seeing a project come to life, no matter if the code works immediately or I have to spend hours debugging.
 My aim is to craft apps that are both highly functional and genuinely enjoyable to use. I understand the importance of intuitive design and strive for seamless user experiences.
 While my background may be a bit unconventional, my ability to think creatively and focus on the end-user remains strong. I'm eager to collaborate and build exceptional apps.
 If you're searching for a developer with a fresh perspective and dedication to quality, let's connect!
